Text:
and yes, it is searched for viruses and such.

download and seed please! :)

and for the record, so nobody is gonna start flaming and such.
I didnt see the newest (6.6.1) uploaded here on TPB, so I thought I'd do it myself.
enjoy
where do u put the serial in i cant find it the only one i found was for the converter where do i put it for the codes

go to All Programs on your start menu,
then go under the Divx - Divx Codec folder,
then Register Products.
Just enter the serial you generated there, and it should say "registered" on all 3 products. :)

enjoy!
thanks for seeding guys, still working now
